name: Wastrl
description:
A roguelike/TBS about getting a band of people across a post-apocalyptic wasteland to reach the haven of Wastrl.

Mostly an experiment in using traditional roguelike mechanics in more general TBS wargame-like setting. Balance and gameplay with lasting interest are not guaranteed.

Features:

  • Shoot nuclear missiles at rats.
  • Watch forests burn down.
  • Be trapped on a mountain by a quake mole.

I only have a Linux executable since I only have Linux. It should run on Mac on Windows, but you will have to run the Python 3 program manually.
